author: barnabasbusa
content:
Current scope of pre-devnet-6 would be the following:
```384 total validators
0 lodestar-nethermind bootnode
64 lodestar-ethereumjs-1
64 lodestar-nethermind-1
0 lodestar-geth-1
64 lodestar-besu-1
64 teku-ethereumjs-1
64 teku-nethermind-1
0 teku-geth-1
64 teku-besu-1
```
